text: Francesco Janich (27 March 1937 - 2 December 2019) was an Italian football player. He played for Italy national team from 1962 to 1966. ==Death== Janich died on 2 December 2019 in Rome at the age of 82.Ãˆ morto Franco Janich, ex calciatore di Bologna e Lazio ==Club career statistics== |- |1956-57||rowspan="2"|Atalanta||rowspan="2"|Serie A||6||0 |- |1957-58||32||0 |- |1958-59||rowspan="3"|Lazio||rowspan="3"|Serie A||32||0 |- |1959-60||33||0 |- |1960-61||28||0 |- |1961-62||rowspan="11"|Bologna||rowspan="11"|Serie A||33||0 |- |1962-63||32||0 |- |1963-64||34||0 |- |1964-65||29||0 |- |1965-66||34||0 |- |1966-67||31||0 |- |1967-68||25||0 |- |1968-69||18||0 |- |1969-70||21||0 |- |1970-71||16||0 |- |1971-72||21||0 |- |1972-73||Lucchese- Libertas||Serie C||23||0 448||0 448||0 |} ==International career statistics== |- |1962||3||0 |- |1963||0||0 |- |1964||1||0 |- |1965||0||0 |- |1966||2||0 |- !Total||6||0 |} ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile at enciclopediadelcalcio.it * Profile at FIGC Category:1937 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Footballers from Friuli-Venezia Giulia Category:Sportspeople from Udine
